relatedNodes.html: We make investments on stocks trading below intrinsic value, based on Opportunity cost, following the principles of Warren Buffet and Charlie Munger. We also try to make major investments in great companies, when they occasionally trade at favourable prices.
Our investment philosophy is built on three core ideas:
Safeguarding your wealth is at the heart of our strategies. We constantly adjust investments to ensure they remain protected through market volatility.
We thoroughly research the market to identify undervalued stocks with strong fundamentals. We buy these assets at their current values and exit when they reach a fair value.
We offer a 0% management fee and only charge a performance fee for our portfolio management service for returns exceeding 10% CAGR.
All You Need to Know About KYNG Portfolio Management services
We are committed to protecting our clients’ downside to prevent any permanent loss of capital.
Our focus on identifying undervalued assets that have strong fundamentals, offering long-term growth potential.
0% Management FEE and Performance FEE only with Returns more than 10% CAGR
A strategic risk-managed growth approach to minimise risk and promote long-term appreciation.
We use GARP to invest in high-quality, growing companies at fair prices, avoiding inflated premiums.
Clear, consistent communication with investors, offering regular portfolio and market updates.
Why Choose Portfolio Management Service by KYNG?

We try to make simple investment decisions that can produce extraordinary results from compounding over long periods.
We like to keep things simple.
We focus on long-term investing strategies outperform short-term tactics , aligning with KYNG’s philosophy of holding onto a few great businesses for extended periods to maximise returns
We are looking to partner with people who share our values
At KYNG Capital Management, we are trying to make simple, prudent investment decisions. We would love to associate with people who share our values. If you feel that way, do connect with us.
